title: What are the examples of whorled leaf? - Quora

response.answer_text: See first of all u should know what are whorled leaves: Whorled leaves are those which grow at a point means it is a arrangement of sepals,petals and leaves,stipules or branches that are radiated from a single point and surround or wrap around stem.  Some of the examples of Whorled or verticil leaves are:- •a very common example is alovera. •Clethra barbinervis(Japanese clethra) •Alstonia scholaris (blackboard tree) •Pittosporum eugenioides (lemonwood) •Kalmia latifolla (mountain Laurel) •Lossestrife etc.
Alstonia scholaris is one of the good example of whorled leaf. Nerium is the another example.
